verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, and all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%>, and all the <S%H929>cattle<s%> that were with him in the <S%H8392>ark<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5674>made<s%> a <S%H7307>wind<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7918>assuaged<s%>;

the <S%H4599>fountains<s%> also of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> and the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> were <S%H5534>stopped<s%>, and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> was <S%H3607>restrained<s%>;

and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from off the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1980>continually<s%>: and after the <S%H7097>end<s%> of a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H2637>decreased<s%>.

And the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H6240>seventeenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat<s%>.

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H2637>decreased<s%> <S%H1980>continually<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>: in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H259>month<s%>, on the first day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, were the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H2474>window<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%>:

and he sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> a <S%H6158>raven<s%>, and it went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>to<s%> and <S%H7725>fro<s%>, until the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were dried <S%H3001>up<s%> from off the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
And he sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> a <S%H3123>dove<s%> from <S%H7200>him<s%>, to see if the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7043>abated<s%> from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>;

but the <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H4494>rest<s%> for the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of her <S%H7272>foot<s%>, and she <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto him to the <S%H8392>ark<s%>; for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>: and he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and took <S%H3947>her<s%>, and brought her <S%H935>in<s%> unto him into the <S%H8392>ark<s%>.
And he <S%H2342>stayed<s%> yet <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and <S%H3254>again<s%> he sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H3123>dove<s%> out of the <S%H8392>ark<s%>;

and the <S%H3123>dove<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> to him at <S%H6256>eventide<s%>; <S%H6310>and<s%>, lo, in her mouth <S%H2132>an<s%> <S%H5929>olive-leaf<s%> plucked <S%H2965>off<s%>: so <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were abated from off the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And he <S%H3176>stayed<s%> yet <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H3123>dove<s%>; and she <S%H7725>returned<s%> not <S%H3254>again<s%> unto him any <S%H5750>more<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and first <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H259>month<s%>, the first day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were dried <S%H2717>up<s%> from off the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H6440>and<s%>, behold, the face of the <S%H127>ground<s%> was <S%H2717>dried<s%>.
And in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, was the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3001>dry<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, <S%H802>thou<s%>, and thy wife, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>' wives with <S%H802>thee<s%>.

Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> with thee every living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that is with thee of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, both <S%H5775>birds<s%>, and <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; that they may breed <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' wives with <S%H802>him<s%>:

every <S%H2416>beast<s%>, every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%>, and every <S%H5775>bird<s%>, <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H7430>moveth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H8392>ark<s%>.

And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1129>builded<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> of every <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%>, and of every <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7306>smelled<s%> the <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, I will not <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> any more for <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H5668>sake<s%>, for that the <S%H3336>imagination<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth<s%>; neither will I <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> any more everything <S%H2416>living<s%>, as I have <S%H6213>done<s%>.

While the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3117>remaineth<s%>, <S%H2233>seedtime<s%> and <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and <S%H7120>cold<s%> and <S%H2527>heat<s%>, and <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter<s%>, and <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> shall not <S%H7673>cease<s%>.
